text: Joseph Patrick Riley Jr. (born January 19, 1943) is an American politician. He was the Mayor of Charleston, South Carolina. He was one of the longest serving mayors in the United States, having been in office from December 15, 1975 to January 11, 2016. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from Charleston, South Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Joseph P. Riley Jr.
